projects.title: Vegfoods.us
projects.description: A catalog for Vegan/Vegetarian/Jain/Swaminarayan people of the food products suitable to eat in US. Send in an image of the food and the app tells you if you can eat it.

projects.title: aksharpatel47.com
projects.description: A Website built using Gatsby.js static site generator and hosted on a VPS.

projects.title: Image Similarity & Classification
projects.description: As part Multimedia and Web Databases course work, finding similar images based on different factors and classifying images based on objects detected in it.

projects.title: NBA Team Win Prediction
projects.description: As part of Statistical Machine Learning course work and based on the NBA dataset, determine which team would win in an match based on previous historical data.

projects.title: Algorithms, Rust, & WebAssembly
projects.description: Implement different algorithms taught in Foundations of Algorithms class using Rust, compile them to WebAssembly and compare its performance to native Javascript.

projects.title: Algorithms & Data Structures in Different Languages
projects.description: Implement different algorithms & Data Structures using Rust, Python & Typescript.

projects.title: Arjun's Last Lesson
projects.description: Game based on the legend of Arjun
